market_context: U.S. equity markets are at an inflection point as of mid-September 2025. Small and mid-cap stocks have begun to outperform after lagging mega-caps. The Russell 2000 jumped ~7% in August amid expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut at the September 16-17 FOMC meeting. A 25 bp Fed rate cut is widely anticipated, which would ease financing conditions for smaller companies. Market context favors catalyst-driven trades in micro-to-mid caps.

trades.catalyst: FDA PDUFA decision on Sept 22, 2025 for apitegromab (muscle disorder biologic)
trades.entry_trigger: Breakout above $34 resistance on strong volume
trades.options_strategy: Buy Oct $35 calls to limit downside risk
trades.profit_taking: Take profits quickly on post-news spike
trades.note: Binary event - FDA approval could spark 30-50% upside, rejection would cause significant loss

trades.catalyst: FDA PDUFA decision on Sept 19, 2025 for Opzelura label expansion to pediatric atopic dermatitis
trades.options_strategy: Buy protective $80 put or bull call spread $85/$90
trades.profit_taking: Take partial profits around $90, tighten stops
trades.note: Incremental approval for already-marketed drug, diversified company reduces risk

trades.catalyst: Q4 Earnings report on Sept 17, 2025 after-market - potential short squeeze setup
trades.options_strategy: Buy Oct $50 calls or call debit spread $50/$60
trades.profit_taking: Sell 50% around $60, trail stop on remainder
trades.note: Extremely high short interest (34% of float), worst likely priced in, any positive surprise could trigger squeeze

trades.catalyst: Insider buying + Q4 2025 clinical data releases for gene therapy in FTD
trades.entry_trigger: Enter around $7, near insider purchase levels
trades.insider_activity: 10% owner Lynx1 Capital bought 128,848 shares, spending $0.72M total
trades.profit_taking: Take profits in stages, sell half at $10
trades.note: Ultra high-risk biotech lottery ticket based on significant insider accumulation

trades.catalyst: Q3 2025 production & delivery numbers expected first week of October
trades.entry_trigger: Buy around $12 consolidation or breakout above $12.50
trades.options_strategy: Sell covered Oct $15 calls for income or bull call spread $12/$15
trades.profit_taking: Sell half at $13.50-14, let remainder run to $15-17 with trailing stop
trades.note: Q3 expected to be peak delivery quarter, R2 SUV development on track, VW investment bolsters cash

risk_management.portfolio_hedge: SPY/IWM puts for Fed meeting week

execution_notes: No single trade exceeds 5% of portfolio
Exit before binary events unless high conviction
Use technical support for stop placement
Total allocation kept under 50% to maintain dry powder
